title: Mystery buyer spends half a million pounds on gold bars... through his smartphone
text: Mystery buyer spends half a million pounds on gold bars... through his smartphone The purchase eclipses a Â£365,000 sale that was made using an iPhone in February 2013 Gold rush: The app trade was the biggest seen by the precious metal's platform. Photo: Borro By Ed Monk , Investment Editor 4:37PM BST 25 Sep 2015
